statements: SELECT * FROM settings_satellite_communication;
SELECT satellite_name, frequency_band, polarization FROM settings_satellite_communication;
SELECT * FROM settings_satellite_communication WHERE beam_width > 60;
SELECT satellite_name, azimuth_angle FROM settings_satellite_communication WHERE elevation_angle < 30;
SELECT id, satellite_name, antenna_type, frequency_band FROM settings_satellite_communication ORDER BY frequency_band DESC;
SELECT * FROM settings_satellite_communication WHERE frequency_band = 'Ku-band';
SELECT satellite_name, elevation_angle FROM settings_satellite_communication WHERE azimuth_angle > 45 ORDER BY elevation_angle DESC;
SELECT id, azimuth_angle, beam_width FROM settings_satellite_communication WHERE polarization = 'Vertical' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM settings_satellite_communication WHERE azimuth_angle < 30 OR elevation_angle > 20 OR polarization = 'Horizontal';
SELECT satellite_name, frequency_band FROM settings_satellite_communication WHERE beam_width > 4.5 AND (polarization = 'Horizontal' OR polarization = 'Vertical') ORDER BY frequency_band ASC;
SELECT * FROM satellite_equipment_settings;
SELECT equipment_name, transmission_frequency FROM satellite_equipment_settings;
SELECT id, equipment_name, encryption_enabled FROM satellite_equipment_settings WHERE encryption_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM satellite_locations WHERE longitude > 0;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM satellite_locations ORDER BY latitude DESC;
SELECT * FROM satellite_equipment_settings WHERE encryption_enabled = TRUE ORDER BY equipment_name DESC
SELECT id, equipment_name, transmission_frequency FROM satellite_equipment_settings WHERE transmission_frequency > 50000 ORDER BY transmission_frequency ASC
SELECT equipment_name, modulation_type FROM satellite_equipment_settings WHERE modulation_type LIKE '%QPSK%'
SELECT * FROM satellite_locations WHERE latitude < 0 AND longitude > 0
SELECT location_name, elevation FROM satellite_locations WHERE elevation BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000 ORDER BY elevation DESC
SELECT * FROM satellite_locations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT equipment_name, frequency_hertz FROM satellite_equipment_configurations WHERE signal_quality > 80;
SELECT site_name FROM site_configurations WHERE site_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM satellite_equipment_configurations ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM satellite_locations WHERE longitude < 0.0;
SELECT * FROM satellite_equipment_configurations WHERE frequency_hertz > 500
SELECT id, equipment_name FROM satellite_locations WHERE country = 'USA'
SELECT site_name, equipment_name, location_id FROM site_configurations ORDER BY site_name DESC
SELECT id, equipment_name, frequency_hertz, signal_quality FROM satellite_equipment_configurations WHERE signal_quality BETWEEN 80 AND 100
SELECT * FROM satellite_equipment_configurations WHERE equipment_name LIKE '%antenna%'
SELECT * FROM satellite_devices;
SELECT device_name, location FROM satellite_devices WHERE id = 3;
SELECT device_name, device_description FROM satellite_devices WHERE device_name = 'Satellite A';
SELECT * FROM communication_settings ORDER BY setting_name DESC;
SELECT device_name, log_date FROM satellite_devices JOIN technician_logs ON satellite_devices.id = technician_logs.device_id;
SELECT * FROM satellite_devices;
SELECT device_name, location FROM satellite_devices WHERE device_name = 'GPS Tracker';
SELECT device_name, device_description FROM satellite_devices WHERE location = 'Orbit';
SELECT type_name FROM device_types ORDER BY type_name DESC;
SELECT device_name, setting_name, setting_value FROM satellite_devices JOIN communication_settings ON satellite_devices.id = communication_settings.device_id;
SELECT * FROM satellite_communication_equipment_settings;
SELECT equipment_name, frequency_range, transmission_power FROM satellite_communication_equipment_settings ORDER BY equipment_name;
SELECT antenna_type, antenna_gain FROM satellite_antennas WHERE antenna_gain > 5;
SELECT id, frequency_range FROM satellite_transponders WHERE modulation_type = 'QPSK';
SELECT * FROM satellite_gateways WHERE location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY bandwidth DESC;
SELECT * FROM satellite_communication_equipment_settings WHERE transmission_power > 50 ORDER BY equipment_name DESC
SELECT equipment_name, antenna_type FROM satellite_communication_equipment_settings WHERE frequency_range IN ('Ka Band', 'Ku Band')
SELECT * FROM satellite_antennas WHERE antenna_gain BETWEEN 2.5 AND 4.0 AND polarization = 'Circular'
SELECT id, frequency_range FROM satellite_transponders WHERE frequency_range LIKE '%GHz%'
SELECT * FROM satellite_channels WHERE encryption_type = 'AES' AND compression_type = 'MPEG-4' ORDER BY channel_id ASC
